MAUI. June 2nd – JUNE 5th, 2022

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.2″ text_font=”||||||||” header_font=”||||||||” header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#87c6ad” header_3_font=”Poppins|600|||||||” header_3_text_color=”#44d89e” header_3_font_size=”36px” header_3_line_height=”1.4em” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”||0px|”]

EVENT SCHEDULE

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.3.1″ text_font=”||||||||”]

Thursday, June 2nd:
Mandatory Registration & Opening Party
Time & Place TBC (Check back soon)

Friday, June 3rd – Kanaha Beach Park – in front of Old Canoe Hale downwind of Old Mans
8:00 am: Mandatory skippers meeting for all disciplines
8:30 am: Beach Cleanup
10:00 am: Notice of Race
11:00 am: First possible start for all disciplines
5:00 pm: Disciplines complete for the day

Saturday, June 4th: Kanaha Beach Park – in front of Old Canoe Hale downwind of Old Mans
10:00 Mandatory skippers meeting for all disciplines
11:00 am: First possible start for designated disciplines of the day
5:00 pm: Disciplines complete for the day

Sunday, June 5th: Kanaha Beach Park – in front of Old Canoe Hale downwind of Old Mans

10:00 Mandatory skippers meeting for all disciplines
11:00 am: First possible start for for designated disciplines of the day
4:00 pm: Event completes
4:00-6:00 pm: Luau and Awards Ceremony at Canoe Hale located by the Public
Restrooms at Kanaha Beach Park

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”2″ custom_padding=”27px|0px|27px|0px|false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”49px|||” custom_padding_phone=”0px|||” column_padding_mobile=”on” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” parallax_method_1=”off” parallax_method_2=”off” parallax_method_3=”off” disabled_on=”on|on|on” _builder_version=”3.3.1″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” global_module=”1146″][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″ column_padding_mobile=”on” parallax=”off” parallax_method=”off”][et_pb_blurb title=”Thursday – June 11″ image=”https://mauikitefest.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/04/beer-3.png” admin_label=”Class” _builder_version=”3.3.1″ header_font=”Poppins|600|||||||” header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#486066″ header_font_size=”18px” header_line_height=”1.3em” body_font=”Open Sans||||||||” body_text_align=”center” body_text_color=”#486066″ body_font_size=”14px” body_line_height=”1.8em” background_color=”#ffffff” border_radii=”on|6px|6px|6px|6px” box_shadow_style=”preset1″ box_shadow_vertical=”10px” box_shadow_blur=”24px” box_shadow_spread=”6px” box_shadow_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0.06)” custom_margin=”|||” custom_padding=”40px|30px|105px|30px” animation=”off”]

5:00 pm: Opening Party & Registration
Venue: Surf Club – 65 Hana Hwy, Paia

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″ column_padding_mobile=”on” parallax=”off” parallax_method=”off”][et_pb_blurb title=”FRI – June 12th” image=”https://mauikitefest.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/04/kitesurf-3.png” admin_label=”Class” _builder_version=”3.3.1″ header_font=”Poppins|600|||||||” header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#486066″ header_font_size=”18px” header_line_height=”1.3em” body_font=”Open Sans||||||||” body_text_align=”center” body_text_color=”#486066″ body_font_size=”14px” body_line_height=”1.8em” background_color=”#ffffff” border_radii=”on|6px|6px|6px|6px” box_shadow_style=”preset1″ box_shadow_vertical=”10px” box_shadow_blur=”24px” box_shadow_spread=”6px” box_shadow_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0.06)” custom_margin=”|||” custom_padding=”40px|30px|66px|30px” animation=”off”]

9 am: – Mandatory Skippers Meeting

10 am: Opening Blessing

11 am – 4 pm: Extreme Big Air, Racing, Wing & Expression Sessions

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″ column_padding_mobile=”on” parallax=”off” parallax_method=”off”][et_pb_blurb title=”SAT – June 13th” image=”https://mauikitefest.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/04/kitesurf-3.png” admin_label=”Class” _builder_version=”3.3.1″ header_font=”Poppins|600|||||||” header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#486066″ header_font_size=”18px” header_line_height=”1.3em” body_font=”Open Sans||||||||” body_text_align=”center” body_text_color=”#486066″ body_font_size=”14px” body_line_height=”1.8em” background_color=”#ffffff” border_radii=”on|6px|6px|6px|6px” box_shadow_style=”preset1″ box_shadow_vertical=”10px” box_shadow_blur=”24px” box_shadow_spread=”6px” box_shadow_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0.06)” custom_margin=”|||” custom_padding=”40px|30px|66px|30px” animation=”off”]

8 am: Beach Cleanup at Kanaha led by Surfrider Foundation

9 am: – Mandatory Skippers Meeting

11 am – 4 pm: Extreme Big Air, Racing, Wing & Expression Sessions

11 am – 4 pm: Extreme Big Air, Racing & Expression Sessions

4 pm:  Awards Ceremony and Luau at Canoe Hale
